Good once you get into it but hard to learn and can be very frustrating if you get a bad game. My main problem is the killer queue times at better ranks. at rank 14 the wait can easily be 15 minutes long.

LA plata que hacen estos tipos y sacan skins una atras de otra a precios ridiculos.. en vez de solucionar la jugabilidad y los servidores.. que a la noche de cada dia revientan de lo colapsados que estan casi injugable, colas interminables para encontrar una partida y te manda a los servidores de estados unidos o vaya a saber donde con ping de 170..200 y pico.. lleva muchos años este juego ya como para tener estos problemas basicos de funcionamiento, la comunidad hace poco se canso y recien ahora empieza a demandar porque si es por ellos este juego que podria ser una autentica locura termina siendo una basura frustrante.. mucho potencial para una compañia tan mediocre.

This is a game that is for horror fans and for those who love friendly competition with their friends. The simple game of Hide and Seek is mixed in with team play and strategy - from deciding what generator to repair, what perks to use and also watching your enemies (killer or survivor) to figure out what they have. Not to mention, it's always an awesome way to get back at your fellow players when you all join in as a 5 member private game! I have never laughed so hard in my life or screamed so loud at the glee of my friends.
i enjoy the fact that there are many different options to play as each killer, also with the challenges and the (talent tree?) to level up each character seperately from your overal player level

I started playing Dead by Daylight when it was first released. I found it to be both a scary and atmospheric game that frightened me every match. I normally don't play scary games so I set it aside and didn't return to it for almost 2 years. Coming back to it I found so much more joy in playing than I had in the past. There were so many perks, characters, and maps to play with. The Dead by Daylight team has really stood by their creation with constant updates and new content. The movie and TV tie in characters have only made the experience that much sweeter. This game has really become a go to for me playing with friends or solo and there's never any hesitation to play when I open Steam. I love unlocking items and perks on all the characters; there's so much to do it really will give you something to work towards for hundreds of hours.

2021 Edit: Still enjoying the game but after so many hours I do feel like the amount of content left to experience is coming to an end. While the game has improved with age it no longer innovates. No new modes have been released and each expansion brings a higher cost of entry for new killers and survivors.

KISACA : 1 katil, 4 kurbanı bir alan içinde yakalayıp öldürmeye çalışıyor. Kurbanlar bu süreç içinde jeneratörleri tamir edip alanın çıkış kapılarını açmaya çalışıyorlar. Uzun vadeli oynanabilecek bir oyun. Arkadaşlarla oynanırsa tadından yenmez. Eklentiler ve karakterlerin geliştirilmesi başarılı. Gelen son güncellemeler oyuna farklı bir hava kattı. Eğer farklı modlar yapılırsa oyun çok popüler olur. Ama yaparlar mı bilmiyoruz :)

Eleştirilerim :
Oyunda çok az denk gelsem bile bug var. Grafikler problemler oluyor arada.
Bazı yerlerden geçişlerde takılma gibi sorunlar olabiliyor. (Çok nadiren)
Lobiden atma vb. ufak tefek problemler yaşanabiliyor. (Çok nadiren)
Bunlar çözülürse çok daha güzel bir oyun olacaktır.

Her şeye rağmen oynanması gereken oyunlardan birisi. Aldığım için pişman değilim.
Özellikle indirimdeyse kaçırmayın!
very fun with friends

Malheureusement le jeu est uniquement du côté du tueur ... Quand tu joues en survivant, tu ne t'amuses pas car le tueur a tout les avantages et le gameplay n'est pas terrible ... A part allumer des générateurs et ouvrir des portes pendant 40 sec et qui fait pleins de bruits ... Rien de faramineux ... 
Il faudrait que les survivants puissent se défendrent .. Arme, pièges, grenade smoke, flash ... 
Enfin, un jeu avec beaucoup de potentiel mais pas du tout exploité :/

This game has come quite a ways since I picked it up over 3 years ago, I think they have finally found a somewhat decent balance to the game at this point. The Devs have made a lot of changes and many improvements as well as improved upon communication to the community as a whole. All in all 7/10

Das Game hat sich in einem halben Jahr deutlich gebessert. Killer kommen genauso schnell in eine Lobby wie Survivor und die Server sind noch genauso gut. Ich habe das Gefühl das Killer und Survivor aktuell gut gebalanced sind. Die Community ist nach wie vor toxisch. Sollte aber ein nicht allzu großes Problem sein, wenn man mit Freunden spielt. Der Shop ist immernoch voll mit (teils) hässlichen Skins. KEIN Pay to Win! Die neuen Killer sind (bis auf Pyramidhead) nur recycelt. 

Vor einem halben Jahr unspielbar, mittlerweile aber wieder echt gut. Ich würde sogar soweit gehen und sagen dass das Game genauso gut ist wie noch vor 2 - 3 Jahren. Wieder spielbar. Ich hoffe es bleibt erstmal so. Good Job Devs!
